rows.label: qst000506_msg0001
rows.name:
Ahh...
So you're Rhiannon's friends!

rows.label: qst000506_msg0002
rows.name: Well, do you need something from us?

rows.label: qst000506_msg0003
rows.name:
Husband! Wyn!
It's terrible! Rhiannon's eloped and-

rows.label: qst000506_msg0004
rows.name: Eloped...?!

rows.label: qst000506_msg0005
rows.name:
Hmph... Just leave it.
A daughter who would associate with
an Superbian is no daughter of mine!

rows.label: qst000506_msg0006
rows.name:
Do you realize you might never see
Rhiannon again?

rows.label: qst000506_msg0007
rows.name:
...She's already gone, hasn't she?
Leave it, I say.

rows.label: qst000506_msg0008
rows.name:
Do you think she'll be happy like that,
running away from everything she's
ever known?

rows.label: qst000506_msg0009
rows.name:
Do you not give a damn for your
own child's happiness?

rows.label: qst000506_msg0010
rows.name:
Quiet! Of course I want her
to be happy!

rows.label: qst000506_msg0011
rows.name:
But approve of her running around
with an Superbian? Bah! Over my
dead body!

rows.label: qst000506_msg0012
rows.name:
You know what Superbians did to
this land, don't you?

rows.label: qst000506_msg0013
rows.name:
It's all in the past! It has nothing to do
with the children of today!

rows.label: qst000506_msg0014
rows.name: Even so, I'm not having it...

rows.label: qst000506_msg0015
rows.name: Oh, you stubborn old fool...

rows.label: qst000506_msg0016
rows.name:
When Nils went to Superbia to
study medicine, you went and
disinherited him too.

rows.label: qst000506_msg0017
rows.name:
But then you still sent Rhiannon to
check on her brother, didn't you?
Despite all you say, you do love them...

rows.label: qst000506_msg0018
rows.name: Hmph...

rows.label: qst000506_msg0019
rows.name:
I don't care how you dress it up,
I'm not changing my mind!

rows.label: qst000506_msg0020
rows.name:
Even if it means never seeing my
daughter again, I'll have...

rows.label: qst000506_msg0021
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]no regrets!

rows.label: qst000506_msg0022
rows.name: [ML:Feeling ]Pigheaded fool...

rows.label: qst000506_msg0023
rows.name:
I've got nothing more to say.
Go on, get out.
